profile:
Ceiling Champions services the GTA and surrounding area's for stucco "popcorn" removal, repair, and refinishing of ceilings. We also can provide you with Crown Moulding, Painting, and PotLights. We also renovate Kitchens, Bathroom, and Cabinet Designs.

Ceiling Champions are here to restore or improve your ceiling or renovation project to 100% and beyond. Our top quality workmanship and attention to detail continue to earn confidence with homeowners in the GTA.

If youâ€™re in the GTA; Etobicoke, Mississauga, Brampton, Ajax, Pickering, Oakville or nearby area, please give us a call to discuss stucco removal, ceiling repair, custom closets, kitchens & bathrooms, Crown Moulding or any other drywall related renovation.

profile:
We service Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Markham, Newmarket, Bradford, Aurora, North York, Scarborough, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Bowmanville, Courtice, Mississauga, Etobicoke and Brampton.

Locally owned, we specialize in all major and minor home repairs. Our uniformed techs are bonded, fully insured and our work is guaranteed. Let us help with that growing "to do" list. Call today!

Handyman Services, Bathroom & Kitchen - Fixtures and Accessories, Fences & Gates, Gutters and Eaves-troughs, Moldings / Moudings, Dry Wall Contractors, Tile and Grout Cleaning, Windows & Doors, Paint & Wallpaper Contractors.

profile:
With over 16 years of experience, Tazmania Painting & Renovation is committed to providing custom work that gives you exactly what you need.

We are a team of fully licensed and insured professionals that will deliver quality, customized, clean, timely, and hassle-free work for our clients. We know how valuable your time, money and privacy are; this is why we provide you with ongoing honest communication that will give you peace of mind like no other company can provide. 

We believe and know that our continued success results from our commitment to customer satisfaction. We deeply value our long-term relationships with each client.

For a free estimate, call Sam at 416-262-6861 !

Check out our website: www.TazmaniaGTA.com
Check out our Instagram: @Tazmania.GTA
specialities: Interior and Exterior Painting. Drywall and Plaster. General Contracting. Project Management.

profile:
F.A Total is a Canadian company  created in 2017, compromised with the customer satisfaction we service and operate to warranty the completion of the necessities of our customers. There is no complex projects in different areas that we can't solve. Our vast experience in Automation, and Painting solution allow us to bring the best options and solutions at a low cost and high quality. 

Working in conventional and luxury houses for years, FA Total  not only offers a fresh and high quality finishing paint to your potential house to sell, to improve, to boost, etc. if not, site management when 3rd parties contractors are involved. We do Service, Maintenance, start up and Support for new and existing Painting projects.
